headline.main: Ancient Buddhist Sculpture Returned to Pakistani Government
headline.print_headline: Ancient Buddhist Sculpture Returned to Pakistani Government

docs.snippet: An ancient stone sculpture of Buddha's footprints that was smuggled into the United States and had been expected to sell for more than $1 million was returned to the government of Pakistan on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An ancient stone sculpture of Buddha's footprints that was smuggled into the United States and had been expected to sell for more than $1 million was returned to the government of Pakistan on Wednesday.

headline.main: Iraq Bans Al Jazeera Network Over Coverage
headline.print_headline: Iraq Bans Al Jazeera Network Over Coverage

docs.snippet: Iraqi authorities have revoked the operating licence of the pan-Arab satellite network Al Jazeera and closed its offices in Baghdad, accusing it of violating government guidelines issued in 2014 to regulate media “during the war on terror.&#...
docs.lead_paragraph: Iraqi authorities have revoked the operating licence of the pan-Arab satellite network Al Jazeera and closed its offices in Baghdad, accusing it of violating government guidelines issued in 2014 to regulate media “during the war on terror.”

headline.main: Phils RHP Charlie Morton Out for Season With Torn Hamstring
headline.print_headline: Phils RHP Charlie Morton Out for Season With Torn Hamstring

docs.snippet: Philadelphia Phillies starting pitcher Charlie Morton is out for the season because of a torn left hamstring....
docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia Phillies starting pitcher Charlie Morton is out for the season because of a torn left hamstring.

headline.main: House Unanimously OKs Bill Bolstering Privacy of Old Emails
headline.print_headline: House Unanimously OKs Bill Bolstering Privacy of Old Emails

docs.snippet: The House used a rare show of unanimity Wednesday to approve legislation requiring the government to get a search warrant if it wants people's older emails....
docs.lead_paragraph: The House used a rare show of unanimity Wednesday to approve legislation requiring the government to get a search warrant if it wants people's older emails.

headline.main: Judge Rejects Redstone Bid to Close Part of Competency Trial
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Redstone Bid to Close Part of Competency Trial

docs.snippet: The trial over media mogul Sumner Redstone's advance healthcare directive should be open to the public, a California judge tentatively ruled on Wednesday in a lawsuit brought by an ex-girlfriend....
docs.lead_paragraph: The trial over media mogul Sumner Redstone's advance healthcare directive should be open to the public, a California judge tentatively ruled on Wednesday in a lawsuit brought by an ex-girlfriend.

headline.main: Franco, Schoop, McHugh Selling Future Earnings for Cash Now
headline.print_headline: Franco, Schoop, McHugh Selling Future Earnings for Cash Now

docs.snippet: Philadelphia third baseman Maikel Franco has agreed to sell 10 percent of his future earnings for $4.35 million to a company called Fantex, which plans to sell securities to investors....
docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia third baseman Maikel Franco has agreed to sell 10 percent of his future earnings for $4.35 million to a company called Fantex, which plans to sell securities to investors.

docs.snippet: Decades ago, the Congolese rumba king popularized a glamorous style that has remained relevant today....
docs.abstract: Recently deceased Congolese musician Jules Shungu Wembadio Pene Kikumba, or Papa Wemba, inspired many with his outlandish fashion choices over decades-long career.
docs.lead_paragraph: Decades ago, the Congolese rumba king popularized a glamorous style that has remained relevant today.
